title: Feral Claws
summaries: Feral Claws are an accessory that increases melee attack speed by 12%, and stacks with all other attack speed boosts. Feral Claws can be found in Jungle Crates, Bramble Crates, and Ivy Chests located in Jungle Shrines and at the base of a Living Mahogany Tree in the Underground Jungle.
In addition to increasing melee attack speed, Feral Claws give autoswing to all melee weapons and Whips.

statistics.Tooltip:
12% increased melee speed
Enables auto swing for melee weapons
statistics.Sell: 1
